author: pburba
msg: Another fix for issue #3896 'mergeinfo syntax errors should be treated
gracefully': Raise an error early during reintegrate merges rather than
potentially getting part way through a merge before blowing up.
(filter_self_referential_mergeinfo): Don't try to filter invalid mergeinfo,

author: pburba
msg: (svn_ra_get_mergeinfo): Note correct API version in deprecated tag.

author: mbenson
msg: special JSF2 handling for AllowedValuesComponentInitializer, do not populate UISelectOne + UISelectItem unless UISelectItem is no-selection option

author: davsclaus
msg: Added relative path to parent in pom.xml
